name: Destroy bombers NOW!
description:
Just is simpel shooter. 

The main task is very easy to complete, the main thing is to find the rail gun. But for example, you can also find:

  • Pistol
  • shotgun
  • All chests
Controls
  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Hold Shift - Run
  • Hold Space - Jump
  • I - inventory
  • LBM and RBM - interectec with item in inventory
  • G - Drop from hand
  • LBM with item in hand - use item or shot
  • F1 - Dev Console (nothing interesting)
